channel.title: Powershell on Frank Doka
channel.description: Recent content in Powershell on Frank Doka

item.title: NYC Department of Correction
item.description: Description Develop and lead large multifunctional system activities including managing, creating and deploying application programs and packages with various technologies such as Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager, Microsoft Deployment Toolkit, Docker. Conduct application testing to validate codebase and remediate issues discovered through performance and security testing. Install, configure, troubleshoot, document and proactively maintain Windows and Linux physical and virtual servers, systems and applications using VMWare and Hyper-V. Monitor, deploy and maintain server and desktop workstation patches and upgrades.
